year: 2025

Analyze your data with ![](/images/galaxy_logo_25percent_transparent.png){height="1em"} and the ![](/images/W4M_icon.svg){height="1em"} infrastructure! 
  
The next Workflow4Experimenters session (![](/images/W4E_icon.svg){height="1em"}2025) will take place from in May 2025. During this one-week course (entirely in English), you will learn how to use the ![](/images/W4M_icon.svg){height="1em"} infrastructure and analyze your own LC-MS, GC-MS, or NMR data. 

For this new session, format changed:

  - From April, 28th to 30th: online theoreticalsessions (methods and tools). This session is *only accessible to person who will be present in Rouen for the onsite session.*
  - From May, 12th to 16th: tutoring on your own data, PBS Laboratory Rouen (Rouen University, Campus de Mont Saint-Aignan, France, close to Paris).

::: callout-important
Preregistration are now closed !! Thanks to all ! We are now selecting participants... 
:::

**Costs**: 1300€ for academic and 2500 € for private institution (to cover expenses for trainers, organization, materials and meals). A special discount of 100€ is offered for ![RFMF](https://www.rfmf.fr/) members 2025.

**Invited speaker**:  
*Ultra-high resolution mass spectrometry and metabolomics*, by **Hélène Lavanant** (COBRA, Univ Rouen) & **Isabelle Schmitz** (PBS, CNRS, Rouen)


![Map of Rouen](/images/map_rouen_w4e2025.PNG)
